Plot: A troubled hedge fund magnate desperate to complete the sale of his trading empire makes an error that forces him to turn to an unlikely person for help.
Title: Arbitrage
Actors: Richard Gere, Susan Sarandon, Tim Roth, Brit Marling
tomatoConsensus: Arbitrage is both a tense thriller and a penetrating character study, elevated by the strength of a typically assured performance from Richard Gere.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 3 wins & 4 nominations.
